article.title: A brunch in KALA, Berlin
article.author: Nadezhda Yankulska
article.excerpt: A standard Berlin-type-of-alternative place, with minimalistic design, a sense of authenticity and close attention to sustainability and eco-friendliness.

authors.bio:
She is a marketing expert, who likes indie music, art, traveling and exploring hidden spaces. 
She likes to brag about the nice food she has tried, but occasionally, 
she also thinks too much about existential crises before going to sleep.
authors.name: Nadezhda Yankulska
